name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in cloud services and automation tools such as **Terraform**, **Puppet**, **Ansible**, and **Jenkins**. Proficient in managing cloud infrastructures across **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, while leveraging **Linux** environments for optimal application performance. I possess advanced scripting skills in **Bash** and **Python**, and have hands-on expertise with database management using **MySQL**, **MariaDB**, and **Galera**, along with cloud databases like **AWS RDS** and **AWS Aurora**. 
Additionally, my solid foundation in full-stack development, utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django** contributes to a holistic view of software deployment and management. I’ve successfully implemented CI/CD pipelines and have deep knowledge of microservices architecture while ensuring compliance with industry standards. My experience extends to collaborative DevOps practices, fostering a culture of innovation and efficiency throughout the software development lifecycle.
